mapper.sql: c.id, c.rate_title AS "title", c.rate_xAxis AS "xAxis", c.rate_legend AS "legend", c.rate_series AS "series", c.remarks, c.del_flag, c.create_by AS "createBy.id", c.create_date, c.update_by AS "updateBy.id", c.update_date
